Name: The Escape
About the game: The Escape Help Johnny Jones Junior to escape, but.....from where?. Who is Johnny J.J. and where does he have to escape from?. Help him in this platformed and puzzle adventure to discover a surprising ending. This is a 3d thirdperson game based on 80's games where you had only some oportunities to beat the game. If you lost all your lifes you will must start from the begining again. Achive several platformed levels with some puzzles to see the end. There are three game modes. Easy with infinity lifes, normal with only three oportunities and Hero mode with only one oportunity.
